snippet.title: Letters - a written adventure Trailer 2019
snippet.description:
Wishlist now on Steam: https://bit.ly/2v07adn

Letters - a written adventure is a multilinear coming of age story told through pen pal letters.
Players can pick up and change words from the text to solve riddles, interact with the environment and change the course of the story.
